name: Escape The Cycle
description:
Escape The Cycle

Run, jump and push your way to the end. And then do it again. And again.

Tread lightly: every rock stays pushed, every unstable platform stays broken.

Warp your way through five cycles to break free and Escape The Cycle.

~ Controls ~

  • [Left]/[Right] to run and push rocks
  • [X] to jump (hold to jump higher!)
  • Hold [Z] to give up and start fresh

If you're really stumped - here's video proof that you can escape the cycle!

This game is built from @mhughson's fantastic Advanced Micro Platformer - Starter Kit
